loans.name: Las Cruces Group

texts.en:
11 women that live in the village of Chuanoj, a rural area of Guatemala, are members of the trust bank Las Cruces (The Crosses). The majority of them work as textile producers of typical Guatemalan skirts that they distribute and sell in their local community as well as in the surrounding areas.

Celestina, a 37 year old married woman with no children, is the owner of a small shop that sells goods used for daily consumption. Her business has helped her and her husband out tremendously by covering costs that her husband’s work could not cover alone. As of now, Celestina is requesting a loan so that she can keep her shelves stocked with the newest goods to be sold. Celestina plans to buy specific items such as soap, sugar, salt, noodles, eggs, oil, beans, and any other goods that her customers request. Celestina also plans to invest any remaining capital from the loan into her secondary business of weaving typical Guatemalan skirts. She hopes to buy attention-grabbing threads that are unique to her style. 

During the two previous loan cycles, the group has greatly benefited from the Micro Credit Plus programs that are offered by Friendship Bridge. Other than the loan, clients receive a monthly, non-formal education that touches on various topics of personal development such as financial literacy, business administration, family planning, and women’s empowerment.

loans.use: to buy items such as soap, sugar, salt, noodles, eggs, oil, and beans for resale

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy 20 piles of firewood and 30 bags of charcoal for her business.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.es:
Samuel tiene 43 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge y sus hijos en casa propia de material rústico en el anexo Pampa Colorada que pertenece al distrito de San Felipe que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La vida en este distrito es tranquila, los pobladores se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Samuel se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de lima, cuenta con una experiencia en el rubro de 10 años y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en la compra de abono y fertilizantes para realizar un adecuado mantenimiento de su cultivo de lima así como para la contratación de mano de obra para la época de cosecha. Con esto Samuel espera ofrecer lima de mejor calidad a sus clientes lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Samuel is 43 years old and lives with his spouse and children in his own house made of rustic materials in an extension of Pampa Colorada that pertains to the district of San Felipe, located in the province of Jaén, in the region of Cajamarca, in the northern mountains of Peru. Life in this district is calm and the residents work primarily in agriculture, commerce and raising livestock. 

Samuel works in agriculture, specifically cultivating limes. He has 10 years of experience in the field and has very good personal and professional references in the area. The loan that he is seeking will be used to purchase manure and fertilizers to adequately maintain his lime crops as well as to hire workers for the harvest season. With this, Samuel hopes to offer better quality limes to his clients which will have a positive impact on his level of income and therefore improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizers to adequately maintain his lime crops.

loans.name: Zamiri Group

texts.fr: Bitondo est une femme commerçante qui s’entraide avec son mari, membre de la banque villageoise Zamiri, cliente de l’IMF Hekima, âgée de 19 ans, mère de 3 enfants dont un écolier et 2 sont gosses. Elle est vendeuse des friperies dans un marché de la ville depuis 3 ans. Elle commença son busines avec de fonds reçu de son mari. Elle va acheter  trois ballons de friperies bébés, femmes et des draps de lit. Elle souhaite acheter une parcelle, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au finish, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables.
texts.en:
Bitondo is a retailer who works together with her husband, and a member of the village finance group Zamiri, a client of IMF Hekima. At nineteen, she is a mother of three, including one child who goes to school and two babies.

She has been retailing second-hand clothes in a local market for three years. She started her business with money that she received from her husband. She will purchase three bundles of baby and women’s second-hand clothing and bed sheets.

She wishes to buy a plot of land, to send her children to school, and to feed them. To conclude, she thanks Hekima for the support it provides to entrepreneurs locked out of the banking system.

loans.use: to buy three bundles of second-hand baby and women's clothing as well as bed sheets.

loans.name: Baraka Group

texts.fr: Grâce à un ancien coordinateur agricole, nous avons appris dans notre milieu à cultiver le paddy et avons trouvé que cette activité est rentable;telles sont les déclarations de Ndogora. Souvent contraint par les difficultés financiers, en eau et les maladies de plantes, Ndogora reste optimiste quant à la volonté d'élargir son espace cultural, de scolariser ses enfants et d'améliorer ses conditions de vie. Sur photo, il porte un tee-shirt rouge-noire et tient dans ses mains un carnet rose.
texts.en:
“Thanks to a former farming organizer, our group learned to farm paddies, and we found this activity to be profitable:” so says Ndogora.

Often confronted to financial difficulties and problems with access to water as well as plant disease, Ndogora remains optimistic regarding his wish to increase his cultivation area, send his children to school, and improve his living conditions. In the photo, he is wearing a red and black shirt and holds in his hands a pink notebook.

loans.use: to replant, weed, buy fertilizer and plant protection products, and to pay workers for the harvest.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cheese, sour cream, ricotta cheese, among other items.

loans.name: Renerio Sr.

texts.en: Renerio Sr., 66, is married and has six children. He lives in Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte, Philippines. He is a dressmaker and owns a tailoring shop just outside his house. He has been in this business for more that 30 years. This is the primary source of income from which he has sent all his children to school. Renerio is asking for a loan of 30,000 PHP to purchase an electric sewing machine and various types of cloth and thread.

loans.use: to purchase an electric sewing machine and various types of cloth and thread

loans.name: Leoncia

texts.en: Leoncia is enthusiastic about farming. She grows corn on her land in Toril, Aloran-Oroquieta City, Misamis Occidental, Philippines and has achieved good income doing this type of work. Recently, she applied for a loan to pay for labor costs to prepare her land. This will ensure that the corn field is ready for planting. Leoncia knew that she has to get things right to yield more income for this cropping season. In the future, Leoncia hopes to buy a truck for easy transport of her produce.

loans.use: to pay for labor to prepare her farm land.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase 30 five-gallon containers of palm oil for her business.

loans.name: Silvia

texts.en:
Silvia is 55 years old. She is a divorced woman and a mother of two kids. She and her family are living at her parent's house 

Silvia works as a secretary but she also studied physiotherapy. She needs a loan to buy furniture to open an office where she will attend to the customers she has. She has some kind of alliance with a doctor and she hopes he can send her some patients. You can help her. She is healthy and she is well trained

loans.use: to buy furniture to open an office.

loans.name: Maria Gumercinda

texts.es: María de 54 años de edad, es madre soltera y habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar desde hace mucho tiempo. María es una mujer admirable quien se gana la vida trabajando como jornalera, además cosecha guineos los cuales los vende a un buen precio lo cual le permite llevar el sustento a su hogar y apoyar con los gastos diarios. María con el deseo de mejorar su condición habitacional anteriormente solicito un crédito el cual le fue de gran utilidad ya que logro construir las paredes de a base de bloque de cemento  la cuales eran de lámina, además cambio parte del techo el cual se encontraba en malas condiciones, María se encuentra muy agradecida y con el objetivo de continuar las mejoras de su humilde hogar  solicita este nuevo crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ventanas, puertas, balcones y láminas para continuar mejorando su vivienda y brindar a su familia una mayor seguridad.
texts.en:
Maria is 54 years old and is a single mother who has lived in her own home with her family group for some time.  Maria is an admirable woman who works as a day laborer. She also harvests bananas which she sells at a good price. This allows her to support her household and afford daily expenses.

With the hope of improving her living conditions, Maria previously asked for a loan which was very useful for her as she was able to build the walls for her home, made of metal sheeting, from the cement foundation. She also changed part of the ceiling that was in bad condition. Maria is very thankful and, with the goal of continuing to improve her humble home, is seeking a new loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of windows, doors, window bars and metal sheets to continue improving her home and providing greater security for her family.

loans.use: to buy windows, doors, window bars, and metal sheets to continue improving her home and offering greater security for her family.

loans.name: Patricio

texts.es:
Patricio tiene 52 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge y sus hijos en casa propia de material rústico en el distrito de Pomahuaca que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La vida en este distrito es tranquila, los pobladores se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Patricio se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de cacao, cuenta con una experiencia en el rubro de 16 años y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en la compra de abono y fertilizantes para realizar un adecuado mantenimiento de su cultivo de cacao así como para la contratación de mano de obra para la época de cosecha. Con esto Patricio espera ofrecer un cacao de mejor calidad a sus clientes lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Patricio is 52 years old and lives with his partner and their children.  They live in their own house, made of rustic materials, in the district of Pomahuaca, which is in the province of Jaén, in the region of Cajamarca, in the northern mountains of Peru.  Life in this district is peaceful.  The residents work primarily in agriculture, business and cattle raising.

Patricio makes his living in agriculture, specifically in growing cacao.  He has 16 years experience in this field, and has very good personal and work references in the zone.  He will use the loan he seeks to buy manure and fertilizers to achieve adequate maintenance of his cacao crop, and to hire workers for the harvest season.  With the loan Patricio hopes to offer a higher quality cacao to his customers.  This will have a positive impact in his level of income and thereby increase his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizers to achieve adequate maintenance of his cacao crop.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase five cartons of fish for her business.

loans.name: Tufanye Kazi Group

texts.fr: Depuis l'an 2000, Jacques est devenu riziculteur grâce à l'appui de ses amis et familiers. Les récoltes supportent beaucoup de familles dans sa cité à tel point que c'est leur activité de base. Il ambitionne produire une quantité suffisante de riz et diversifier les semences surtout pour celles qui permettent de récolter après 4 mois. ceci aura pour effet d'attenuer leur misère pour qu'enfin que tous les enfants soient scolarisés sans distinction de sexe. Sur la photo, il tient un carnet rose.
texts.en:
Since the year 2000, Jacques has become a rice farmer thanks to the support of his friends and family. The harvests support many families in his town, to such an extent that it is the main activity locally.

His ambition is to produce enough rice and to diversify the seeds, especially to those that can be harvested after four months. This will allow him to attenuate their poverty so that all children can finally attend school regardless of their gender.

In the photo, he is holding a pink notebook.

loans.use: to replant, weed, buy fertilizer and plant protection products, and to pay workers for the harvest.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy an industrial sewing machine and materials for her dressmaking workshop.

loans.name: Rosalyn

texts.en:
Rosalyn is 35 years old. She is married and has two sons. She lives with her parents and they are the owners of the house.

Rosalyn is still working as a cook and she needs a loan to buy groceries to like rice, noodles and other ingredients. In the future, Rosalyn would like to have her own house. She hopes you can help her again.

loans.use: to buy a table, an oven and kitchen supplies for her food sales business.

loans.name: Cerlie

texts.en:
Cerlie has a wide experience in farming. She has mastered farming activities such as growing, caring for, and harvesting crops. Cerlie earns an income as well and she supports her husband doing this type of work.  She has nurtured her membership with PMPC and has maintained a good repayment record. Cerlie knows she can always turn to the cooperative for her financial needs. 

Cerlie is requesting a loan to pay for labor costs to prepare her land. Someday, Cerlie hopes to purchase another plot of land to cultivate. This land would potentially add income for her family.

loans.use: to pay for labor costs to prepare her land

loans.name: Eufronia

texts.en:
Eufronia sells firewood to earn a meager income of 6,000 PHP each month. Retailing has help her family survive. 

Eufronia is applying for a loan with PMPC to purchase additional firewood to sell. She plans to expand her business in the future. Eufronia smiles at the thought of seeing all her children finish their studies.

loans.use: to purchase firewood to sell

loans.name: Eliso

texts.en:
Eliso is a 37-year-old married woman from Tskaltubo district. She has a husband who is temporarily unemployed. Eliso also was unable to find any stable job, so she started work as a private teacher and teaches Russian language to local children. She gets a small income that is hardly enough to meet even the basic needs of the family. Eliso wants to make an additional source of income and sought credit among local financial institutions. She has been approved for a loan within the framework of a joint initiative between Kiva and Credo. The start-up loan program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products. Eliso will purchase various kinds of clothing in the capital and get private orders also.

The loan will greatly assist Eliso and she will be able to improve her economic situation and give her family a better style of life. Eliso and her husband rely on the goodwill of the lenders.

loans.use: To make additional income by trading in clothing.

loans.name: Zike

texts.en: With your previous loan, Zike got a dairy cow. She now wants to add another one to the crew because she plans on expanding the livestock

loans.use: to add another dairy cow

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to repair and maintain his vehicle, as currently, it is in poor condition.

loans.name: Sobhana Priyadarshini Shg-D Group

texts.en:
Sandhyarani, 31, on the extreme left, is the featured borrower of Sobhana Priyadarshini SHG-D. She is from the village of Chuhapali in the Koraput district. She is married with three kids, and her husband is a driver. She is happy tending her little grocery store. The store is her means of earning a living to support her family. Fortunately, her store is located in a populous neighbourhood, and so she makes promising daily sales. Sandhyarani keeps on running the store well even though there is increased competition from other stores. 

However, Sandhyarani does not have an adequate source of drinking water and depends upon the river for consumption. The river water is very muddy and dirty and can have serious implications for human health. So for this reason, Sandhyarani and her group members have requested a loan of 36,000 Indian rupees in order to purchase a water purifier and get safe and clean water to drink.

Sandhyarani aspires to diversify her business and add more stock to her business to increase her return on investment.

loans.use: to purchase a water purifier

loans.name: Mujeres De Fortaleza Group

texts.es:
LAS MUJERES DE FORTALEZA ESTA CONFORMADA POR  OCHO INTEGRANTES MADRES SOLTERAS CON DIES HIJOS BAJO SU RESPONSABILIDAD, ORIGINARIAS DE   MALPAISILLO, LUGAR QUE ESTA UBICADO EN LA ZONA NORTE DE LA REGIÓN, SE CARACTERIZA POR SER TRABAJADORA RESPONSABLE CON GANAS DE SUPERACIÓN PERSONAL, EN LA ACTUALIDAD LUCHAN PARA SUPERAR TODOS LOS RETOS  Y  SACAR ADELANTE A SUS HIJOS, Y PROPORCIONALES  MEJORES OPORTUNIDADES DE VIDA.
GRACIAS A  SUS GANAS DE SUPERACIÓN LA CORDINADORA ES  PETRONA TIENE POR ACTIVIDAD ECONOMICA UNA PULPERIA ES UNA PEQUEÑA TIENDA QUE VENDE PRODUCTOS COMESTIBLES COMO: ARROZ, FRIJOLES, AZÚCAR, LECHE, PAN, HUEVOS, DETERGENTES, JUGOS, GASEOSAS, GALLETAS, ETC.  ELLA DEDICA A SU NEGOCIO UNAS DOCE HORAS DIARIAS OFRECIENDO SUS PRODUCTOS EN SU CASA DE HABITACIÓN.  MUJERES DE FORTALEZA AGRADECE LA AYUDA QUE LOS INVERSIONISTAS KIVA LE BRINDAN A PERSONAS DE ESCASOS RE CURSOS Y PAISES POBRE COMO ES NICARAGUA PARA TENER UN MEDIO DE TRABAJO DIGNO.
texts.en:
The group Mujeres de Fortaleza [Women of Strength] is made up of eight members who are single mothers with a combined 10 children in their care. They come from Malpaisillo, which is located in the northern area of the region. The members of the group are hard workers, responsible, and have the desire to overcome their personal situations. Currently, they are fighting to overcome all of their challenges and bring their children forward, providing them with better life opportunities.

Thanks to her desire to overcome, the coordinator of the group is Petrona who owns a corner store. It is a small store where she sells food products such as rice, beans, sugar, milk, bread, eggs, detergent, juice, soda, cookies, etc. She works in her store 12 hours a day offering her products from a room in her home.

The Mujeres de Fortaleza group is thankful for the help that Kiva lenders offer to low-income people and poor countries like Nicaragua, so that they can have the means to a decent job.

loans.use: to invest in food products such as rice, beans, sugar, milk, bread, eggs, detergent, juice, soda, cookies, etc.

loans.name: Tikary De Habitad Illary Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “TIKARY DE HABITAD ILLARY”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Inge Milagros ella es soltera y tiene 47 años y tiene 2 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de tienda de abarrotes , la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, leche y aceite, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 5 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar leche, azúcar, aceite y arroz.
El socio que esta pegado a la foto grupal se les tomo la foto despues de la reunion porque pidieron permiso por motivos de trabajo.
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de comida, negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de restaurant.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to the communal bank "TIKARY DE HABITAD ILLARY".  This bank is located in the district of Urubamba, belonging to the province of Urubamba and Cusco department.

The [featured] member is Mrs. Inge Milagros.  She is single and is 47 years old and has two sons. This member works in the grocery store business.  The member sells staples like rice, sugar, milk and oil.  She works from 8:00 am to 6:00 pm.

The member has been in this business for 5 years and is doing very well.  Her dream is to expand her grocery business. 

The member is  requesting a loan to buy milk, sugar, oil and rice.

The member whose photo is attached to the group photo took the photo after the meeting because he had permission from work.

The other members are in the business of selling street food, clothing sales business, grocery store business and restaurant business.

The member feels grateful to those who are part of this dream through this medium and agrees to comply with the payment of her quotas by the established deadline.

loans.use: to  purchase milk, sugar, oil and rice.

loans.name: Gheorghe

texts.en:
Gheorghe is 25 years old. He is married. His wife Irina is a housewife.

Gheorghe has been working for a couple of years in Italy as a builder. Now he wants to start a new business with auto spare parts. Gheorghe has attended special courses for young businessmen. He rents a small boutique for this start up for 120 USD per month. Gheorghe expects in 12 months to be at the break even point.

This hard-working young man will use this loan to buy spare parts to sell. Gheorghe want to be a true businessman with excellent income to support his family. This loan will help Gheorghe to fulfill his dreams.

loans.use: to buy spare parts to sell

loans.name: Nino

texts.en:
Nino is from the capital of Georgia, and lives with her pensioner parents and son. She works as a nurse and gets a small monthly income. The family belongs to the subsistence poor category, as they have no source of significant income and live under poverty. Because of the above mentioned situation, Nino lacks access to capital markets and financial institutions to obtain credit for starting a business, as they require enough income and business experience. The Start Up program created by Kiva and Credo enabled her to get a loan of 7500 GEL and make an additional source of stable income. With the credit, Nino will renovate the flat she owns in the capital and will rent it for a good price, as the demand is high and she will easily find lodgers.

She is a very enthusiastic and hardworking person with a great desire to ensure her son has a good education for progressing in life. This credit will be a great support for the family. Nino is thankful to Kiva Lenders for giving her a chance to generate more income.

loans.use: To renovate the flat she owns in the capital and rent it out.

loans.name: Jetmir

texts.en:
Jetmir is a hardworking single man who is in his mid-twenties and currently lives in the city of Elbasan. He has been running an auto service shop for the past three years and is content with the choice he made. “I have built a good clientele that continues to grow, and this is how I measure how well I have been serving clients. Recently, I opened up another shop along some major road and have my dad helping me out too. I can’t do it all by myself,” said a smiling Jetmir to the loan officer. He lives with his parents and soon-to-be-bride. The only earnings his family makes are the $450/month that Jetmir earns through his activity.

He is applying for this loan because he wants to add some inventory of tools and other necessary items to use in the auto service shops he runs.

loans.use: to buy tools and other necessary items for the auto shops he runs

loans.name: Nela

texts.en:
Nela is a farmer who wants to get ready for the next cropping season. She wants to have a head start to prepare her land for planting. 

Nela is requesting a 14,900 PHP loan from PMPC to pay labor costs to prepare her land for planting.

loans.use: to pay for labor costs to prepare her land

loans.name: Mother Mariie Shg-A Group

texts.en:
Soudamini, 23, standing to the left in a blue sari, is the featured borrower of Mother Mariie SHG-A. She hails from the village of Chuhapali in the Koraput district. Soudamini is a strong woman and a single mother, who is devoted to providing the best life she can for her son. She currently works long hours at an educational institution helping students better themselves and pursue their dreams. Inspired by the very students she assists on a daily basis, Soudamini decided to further her education and graduate from college. 

Living on one income while maintaining a home and providing for her child has proven challenging. Not only does she support her son and household on her own, but she also pays for her educational expenses on her own as well. After her divorce, Soudamini was left with a portion of her spouse’s debt. Although she has lived up to her obligations, the initial struggle of covering her living expenses and providing for her son on her own while paying off the debt has put a strain on Soudamini’s credit. 

Soudamini is now well established in her life, but she is experiencing difficulty obtaining an affordable loan to renovate her toilet, which is damaged due to storms. Soudamini and her group member are requesting a total loan of 24,000 Indian rupees. She will renovate her toilet to lead a healthy and hygienic life with her only son.

loans.use: to renovate her toilet

loans.name: Lucero Sesy

texts.es:
Lucero, es una joven estudiante de Administración Industrial, carrera que le gusta mucho porque le encanta los números y la carrera le llamó mucho la atención, llegándole a gustar mucho. La beneficiará mucho en lo económico y en lo profesional porque le permitirá trabajar en diferentes áreas.

Ella está estudiando ya 2 años, aún le falta un año y medio para poder culminar su carrera. Le va muy bien en sus estudios, el único obstáculo que ve en su carrera es lo económico en su familia, porque es una carrera muy costosa. A ella le gustaría trabajar en el Área de Logística o Producción de una gran empresa.

Ella necesita el préstamo para poder pagar sus estudios y no truncar sus sueños de llegar a tener su propia empresa. Este préstamo la ayudará mucho, porque ya no se preocupará en lo económico, además al terminar sus estudios será una persona profesional. Con este préstamo se siente más tranquila, porque sabe que será un poco más fácil poder culminar sus estudios.

Ella se siente feliz al saber que existen personas con un gran corazón que son capaces de ayudar a los que lo necesitan. Lucero les quiere dedicar unas palabras:"Agradecerles por aquel apoyo que me brindarán y no los decepcionaré porque sé que culminaré mis estudios profesionales".
texts.en:
Lucero is a young student in Industrial Administration, a career she likes a great deal because she loves numbers.  The program really caught her attention, and she has come to like it a lot.  It will provide her great economic and professional benefit in the future because it will allow her to work in different areas.

She has been studying for 2 years.  She has one and a half years left to complete her degree.   She's done very well in her studies.  The only obstacle she sees in her studies are the economic cost to her family, since it is an expensive program.  She would like to work in the logistics or production areas of a large business.

She needs a loan to be able to pay for her studies and not cut short her dreams of one day having her own business.  This loan will help her a great deal, because she would no longer be worried about finances.  In addition, once she completes her studies, she will be a professional.  With this loan she will feel more peaceful because she knows it will be a bit more easy to complete her studies. 

She feels happy knowing people with big hearts exist, who are able to help those who need it.  Lucero wants to share these words: "Thank them for the support they will provide me, and I won't disappoint them because I know I will finish my professional studies."

loans.use: to continue studying Industrial Administration and have her own business.

loans.name: Cecilo

texts.en: Cecilo is 68 years old, married and lives in Isidro D. Tan, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental. He owns and operates a sari-sari store (convenience store) which adds to his monthly income aside from his pension. He is a MIGS member of the cooperative that he nurtures with no records of default payments. Currently, he avails of a loan of PHP 20,000.00 to purchase bags of cement and steel, and pay for labor costs for house repair.

loans.use: to purchase bags of cement and steel, and pay for labor costs for house repair.

location.town: Tangub-Isidro D. Tan, Tangub City, Mindanao

loans.name: Victoria Secret Group

texts.en:
Betty is the leader of the Victoria Secret Solidarity Group which is made up of five members. All five members including Betty are engaged in petty trading but selling different products.

Betty, who is 45 years old, was unanimously appointed to lead the group because of her wealth of experience in managing people. She sells cooked food and drinks. Betty has been selling cooked food and drinks for the past five years. She uses the proceeds from her business to pay fees for her children’s education and to provide a livelihood for her family.

Betty and the other group members of Victoria Secret Solidarity are requesting for their first loan a total of 5,000,000 SLL. Of this amount, Betty will personally receive 1,000,000 SLL, which she will use to purchase a bag of rice, a gallon of palm oil and a carton of fish for her business. Betty is standing in the middle of the picture.

Betty is married and has a cheerful family of two children with the ages of 20 and 5 years old. Betty hopes that her business will continue to exist so that she can save enough money to build a dwelling house and also prepare for her old age. Betty hopes that this loan will earn her more profit for her to support her family.

Betty and her group members thank you for financing their businesses.

loans.use: to purchase a bag of rice, a gallon of palm oil and a carton of fish.

loans.name: Cresencia

texts.en:
Cresencia is 58 years old, a widow, with three children of adult age, and she lives in Bonifacio-Tangub, Misamis Occidental. She offers services like manicures and pedicures to the neighborhood. She is also a farmer who tills her own rice field. She's been doing this for quite some time, since her husband passed away. These business activities made her able to send all her children to school until they finished college.

Cresencia is thankful to the cooperative for its programs and services that help her with her farming activity. Just recently, she applied for a loan of PHP 50,000.00 to purchase bags of cement, plywood, nails, steel bars, and galvanized iron sheets, and pay for labor costs. She hopes to live comfortably this time in a decent home.

loans.use: to purchase bags of cement, plywood, nails, steel bars, and galvanized iron sheets, and pay for labor costs.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
Alicia signed up for her membership with PMPC and obtained the needed capital to start up a sari-sari (variety) store. She is thankful for the capital that was extended to a small-time borrower like her. Alicia has been able to turn the tide in her favor. She is making good sales these days and wants to take advantage of her good fortune. 

Alicia is requesting a loan to restock her store with basic commodities such as canned goods, oil, and soy sauce. In the future, she hopes to build a decent home for her family.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, oil, and soy sauce.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.es:
Gladys es estudiante y también está trabajando para poder ser alguien en la vida, y crecer como persona y profesional.
Ella está poniendo todo de sí para poder cumplir con sus metas y anhelos, es por ello que se esfuerza mucho. Estudia la carrera de Fisioterapia y Kinesiologia.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Gladys is a student and is also working in order to make something of her life and to grow as a person and a professional.  She is giving her all to achieve her goals and desires.  That's why she works so hard.  

She studies physical therapy and kinesiology.  She seeks this loan in order to pay her school fees, and thereby continue with her studies.

loans.use: to pay her university fees.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.es:
Daniel es el mayor de tres hermanos, vive con  sus padres. Es el primer integrante de la familia en cursar una carrera universitaria, está estudiando para ser ingeniero comercial. 
Daniel a la vez que estudia también trabaja, luchando de esa forma para poder salir adelante.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su universidad y seguir estudiando.
texts.en:
Daniel is the youngest of three siblings, and lives with his parents.  He is the first member of his family to pursue a college degree.  He is studying to be a commercial engineer.
 
While studying, Daniel also works, striving in this way to get ahead.  He seeks this loan to be able to pay his university fees and continue studying.

loans.use: to pay his university fees.

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es:
MARIA MAGDALENA CON 34 AÑOS DE EDAD, SEPARADA, VIVE CON SUS 3 HIJOS, EN CASA FAMILIAR, EN UNA COMUNIDAD GRANDE EN LA ZONA URBANA DE CAYALTI QUE PERTENECE A LA PROVINCIA DE CHICLAYO, REGION LAMBAYEQUE, COSTA NORTE DE PERU.ESTA COMUNIDAD SE DEDICA MAYORMENTE A LA AGRICULTURA, COMERCIO Y GANADERIA.

MARIA MAGDALENA SE DEDICA A LA ACTIVIDAD DE VENTA DE ROPA Y ZAPATOS PARA DAMAS Y CABALLEROS, DESDE HACE MÁS DE 2 AÑOS DE ANTIGUEDAD EN EL NEGOCIO, EN SU PROPIO DOMICILIO.Y GOZA CON BUENAS REFERENCIAS PERSONALES Y LABORALES DE PARTE DE SUS VECINOS. SOLICITA PRESTAMO PARA LA COMPRA DE ROPA Y ZAPATOS COMO MERCADERIA PARA SURTIR MAS SU NEGOCIO. DE ESTA MANERA HACER CRECER MAS SU NEGOCIO,OBTENER MÁS INGRESOS Y PODER MEJORAR SU CALIDAD DE VIDA.
texts.en:
María Magdalena is 34 years old, separated, and lives with her 3 children in their own house. She lives in a large community belonging to the city of Cayaltí, which belongs to the province of Chiclayo, in the region of Lambayeque, on the north coast of Peru. The residents of this community work primarily in agriculture, commerce, and cattle.

María Magdalena has been selling clothing and shoes for women and men from her home for more than 2 years. She has good personal and work references from her neighbors. She is requesting a loan to buy clothing and shoe merchandise to better stock her business. In this way, she can grow her business, earn more income, and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy clothing and shoe merchandise to better stock her business.

loans.name: Cesarlita

texts.en: Cesarlita is 45 years old, married, has two children of adult age, and lives in Garang, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental. She owns and operates a sari-sari store (convenience store) and a corn farm supported by her husband as the farmer. She wants to get a head-start for this cropping season. Recently, she availed of a loan to purchase bags of fertilizer for her farming business. She believes that having enough inventory of fertilizer will give her a good harvest.

loans.use: to purchase bags of fertilizer for her farming business.

location.town: Tangub - Garang, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is a businesswoman who makes a living selling various items. She is also a teacher and a farmer. Teresita is a full-fledged member of PMPC and enjoys the benefits of insurance and financial assistance. 

Teresita is requesting a loan to purchase bags of cement, steel bars, galvanized iron sheets, and pay for labor costs to renovate her home. In the future, she wishes to live comfortably with her family.

loans.use: to purchase cement, steel bars, galvanized iron sheets, and pay for labor costs

location.town: Tangub - Banglay, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental

loans.name: Genara

texts.en:
Genara has vast experience in farming. She has mastered farming activities from growing, caring and harvesting and earning income, as well. Genara has supported her husband doing this type of work.  As in farming, Genara has nurtured her membership with PMPC and has maintained a good repayment record. She knows she can always turn to the Cooperative for her financial needs. 

Genara recently applied for a loan to purchase rice seeds so she will have good results in healthier, heavier, and potentially higher-yielding seedlings.  Someday, Genara hopes to purchase another piece of land to cultivate rice that will potentially add income for the family.

loans.use: to purchase rice seeds to produce healthier, heavier, and potentially higher-yielding seedlings

loans.name: Aldo

texts.es:
Aldo viene de una familia de 4 integrantes, está estudiando para ser licenciado en Químico y Farmacias.
Su meta es la de brindar para sí mismo y su familia un futuro mejor, obteniendo grandes logros personales, es por ello que lucha y se esfuerza.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y así seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Aldo is from a four-person family. He is studying for a bachelor’s degree in Chemistry and Pharmacy.

His goal is provide a better future for himself and his family and to achieve big personal goals, and he is working hard for this.

He is requesting this loan to in order to pay his tuition so he can continue with his studies.

loans.use: to pay his university tuition.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria is 60 years old, married and has two children of adult age. She lives in Molave, Zamboanga del Sur, where she owns and operates a rice field. She has mastered the process of farming from land and seedbed preparation to sowing, replanting, growing and harvesting. She's even a master in post-harvest operations, where she lets the land rest for three months and plants it with other varieties of crops, like watermelon, pumpkins or peanuts.

Gloria is a Microfinance member of Paglaum MPC where she accessed all her financing needs for her farming activities. Recently, she availed of a loan to purchase bags of fertilizers and pesticides.

loans.use: to purchase bags of fertilizer and pesticides.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en: Lolita, 52 years old, is married and has 4 children of school age. She lives in Baybay Bonifacio-Tangub City, Misamis Occidental. Lolita is engaged in a coffee production business, supported by her husband, who is a government employee. She plans to renovate her house and improve general living conditions. Lolita applied for a loan to purchase sticks, hardwood and nails and to pay for labor costs.

loans.use: to purchase sticks, hardwood and nails and to pay for labor costs

loans.name: Laura

texts.es:
Laura tiene 46 años de edad, vive con su conyuge y sus dos menores hijos en una zona rural del distrito de Pucará que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la costa norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

Laura se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado caprino, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Cuenta con años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona; además su cónyuge se dedica a dar servicio de transporte público (mototaxi). El préstamo que solicita será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de chivos, carneros, entre otros así como para la compra de alimento balanceado para estos. Con esto Laura espera ofrecer un mejor producto a sus clientes lo que le va a permitir generar mayores ingresos y por ende incrementará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Laura is 46 years old and lives with her spouse and her two minor children in a rural area of the district of Pucará, located in the province of Jaén, in the region of Cajamarca, in the northern coast of Peru. The residents of this district primarily work in agriculture, raising livestock, and commerce.

Laura works raising and selling goats. Her business is located in her home. She has many years of experience in the business and has good personal and professional references in the area. Also, her husband works in public transportation as a motorcycle taxi driver.

The loan she is asking for will be used to buy a larger quantity of goats and rams, and also to buy balanced food for the animals. With this, Laura hopes to offer a better product to her clients, which will allow her to generate greater income and therefore, improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of goats and rams, and also to buy balanced food for the animals.

loans.name: Esther Emelina

texts.es: Esther durante años había residido en el vecino país de Venezuela, sin embargo considero que podría nuevamente vivir en Cartagena de Indias en compañía de su familia y dedicarse a la venta de Fritos (empanadas, buñuelos, arepas y deditos) y bebidas como avena y jugos naturales.  Siendo este el único sustento para su familia puesto que se encuentra separada y es madre de cuatro hijos, Esther labora todos los días a partir de las 6 a.m. hasta las 6 p.m. desde la terraza de su casa.  En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para comprar maíz, carne, queso y frutas. Con esta inversión pretende capitalizarse y continuar con esta actividad.
texts.en:
Esther has lived for several years in the neighboring country of Venezuela. However, she decided that she could return to live in Cartegena de Indias in the company of her family and sell fried foods (empanads, buns, arepas [thick corn tortillas filled with a variety of fillings], and cheese bread sticks) and soft drinks such as oatmeal drinks and natural juices. This is her family’s only income, since she is separated and the mother of four children. 

Esther works every day from 6am until 6pm, from the porch of her house. She is currently requesting a Kiva loan, the first loan she has had with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, so that she can buy corn, meat, cheese, and fruits. She will use these funds for her business so she can continue with it.

loans.use: to buy corn, meat, cheese, and fruits.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.es:
Lucia es una persona muy trabajadora, que se esta esforzando para poder salir adelante y mejorar cada día. Comenta que su préstamo anterior le ha sido muy útil, porque pudo pagar sus gastos de titulacion, y le fue de mucha ayuda. Hoy sigue estudiando y esta siguiendo una nueva carrera de Asesoramiento Pedagógico, y sigue aumentando sus conocimientos de esta forma.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma continuar creciendo.
texts.en:
Lucia is a very hard working person, who is striving to move forward and better herself each day.  She comments that her prior loan has been very useful, as she was able to pay the costs associated with her degree, which was a great help.  

She is currently continuing her studies and increasing her knowledge by pursuing a new career in educational consulting.  She seeks this loan to be able to pay the costs of this program, and thereby continue growing.

loans.use: to pay her university fees.

loans.name: Tabara

texts.fr: Madame Tabara est une femme divorcée.Elle est âgée de 53 ans et mère d'un garçon en charge. Elle s'active dans la restauration depuis plusieurs années au marché. Elle fait un approvisionnement bimestriel en denrées alimentaire de base. quant au poisson et des légumes elle le achète journellement. Elle est une femme dynamique et très brave qui a toujours remboursé ses prêts sans difficulté. Les bénéfices vont servir à la prise en charge de sa famille (nourriture, santé, scolarité etc...).
texts.en: Ms. Tabara is a divorced woman, 53 years old, and the mother of one boy in her care. She has been active in the restaurant business at the market for several years. She goes for basic supplies every two months. As for the fish and vegetables, she purchases them daily. She is a good and honest woman, and energetic too. She has always paid back her loans without difficulty. The profits will be used to support her family (food, healthcare, schooling, etc….)

loans.use: to purchase fish, vegetables, and rice

loans.name: Natividad

texts.en: Natividad, 40 years old, is married and has 3 children of school age. She lives in Tudela, Misamis Occidental. For the past 10 years, Natividad has operated a poultry business which gives her additional income of PHP 20,000 every month. She signed up for membership to the cooperative for financial assistance. Recently, Natividad took out another loan of PHP 40,000 to buy animal feed and vitamins for her layer chickens.

loans.use: to buy animal feed and vitamins for her layer chickens

loans.name: Ana

texts.en:
Ana, 53, is married, has three adult children and lives in Ozamiz City, Misamis Occidental. She owns and operates a stall at the local market, retailing various consumable goods. 

She has signed up for membership with Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative to avail herself to various loan products. Recently, she requested a loan of 50,000 Philippine pesos to purchase bags of cements, steel and galvanized iron sheets and pay for labour. 

Ana hopes to live comfortably in a decent house with her family.

loans.use: to purchase bags of cements, steel and galvanized iron sheets and pay for labour

loans.name: Jessel

texts.en:
Jessel, 38 years old, is a businesswoman from Unidos, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. She is married and has expertise in selling. Jessel runs a little sari-sari store, earning a meager income that sufficiently supports her family. Jessel is a full fledged member of PMPC and has taken out several loans already. She maintains her membership in good standing without records of default. 

Jessel has applied for a loan to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items. Jessel continues to look for better business opportunities, proof that she has the passion and the energy to make ends meet for her family.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items

loans.name: Nilda

texts.en:
Nilda is a businesswoman who earns through retailing various items. She is a full-fledged member of PMPC and enjoys the benefits of insurances and financial assistance.

Recently, she applied for a loan to purchase bags of cement and hollow blocks. She is on her way to renovating her house. She wishes to live comfortably with her family.

loans.use: to purchase bags of cement and hollow blocks

loans.name: Elmera

texts.en:
Elmera heads for the next cropping season. She wants to prepare well, especially the much needed land and seedbed preparations.

She wants to have a large enough supply of bags of fertilizer for which she applied for a loan from the Cooperative. Elmera hopes to save enough for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy bags of fertilizer to grow more produce.

loans.name: Nelma

texts.en: Nelma, 61 years old, is married and has six children, two of them in school. Nelma works very hard to provide for them. For the past 5 years, she has run a business buying and selling nipa roofing in the Philippines. Nelma has requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional bundles of nipa roofing to sell. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional bundles of nipa roofing to sell

loans.name: Leticia

texts.es:
Leticia es de la ciudad de Villarrica, es una persona que se está esforzando y luchando por poder ser un profesional útil, no solo a sí mismo, sino también con las demás personas.
Está estudiando la carrera de derecho, ya que quiere ser una buena abogada que pueda abrirse camino por medio de sus estudios.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y así estar más cerca de cumplir con sus metas.
texts.en:
Leticia is from the city of Villarrica and is a person who is working hard and fighting to be a productive professional, not only for herself but also for others.

She is studying law, as she wants to be a good lawyer who can make a way for herself through her studies. She asks for this loan to be able to pay for the university costs of her degree so as to be closer to achieving her goals.

loans.use: to pay her university costs.

loans.name: Diego

texts.es:
Diego está estudiando para ser notario, está poniendo su mejor esfuerzo para poder ser un profesional útil, no solo a sí mismo, sino también a los demás.
Él quiere ser alguien en la vida para poder ayudar a las demás personas. Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Diego is studying to be a notary and is putting forth his best effort to be able to be a productive professional, not only for himself but also for others.
He wants to be someone in life to be able to help other people. He asks for this loan to pay for the costs of his degree and thus be able to continue with his studies.

loans.use: to pay for university costs.

loans.name: Matilde

texts.en: Matilde, 83 years old, is a widow who lives in Mamanga Gamay, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. She lives with her younger child who takes good care of her. Matilde is a pensioner member of the cooperative. She is thankful to the cooperative because of the financial services it extends to senior citizens like her. Recently, she took out a loan of PHP 9,000 to purchase vitamins and maintenance medicines.

loans.use: to purchase vitamins and maintenance medicines

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in wholesale flour, propane gas cylinders, baking pans, yeast, etc.

loans.name: Astou's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe de 16 membres fait partie du banc villageois qui a été crée le 24 octobre 2007. Il regroupe des femmes du même quartier qui ont de bonnes relations et qui s'activent principalement dans le commerce.
KANNY debout a droite de la photo et levant la main gauche est âgée de 27 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 2 filles.
Avec le prêt reçu, elle va acheter du savon, des parfums et des laits de corps. Elle achète le paquet de savon de 18 a 1000 FCFA et revend l’unité a 250 FCFA. Pour les parfums elle achète deux façons, l'une a 1500 FCFA et le cède a 2000 FCFA, l'autre a 350 FCFA et  le cède a 500 FCFA. Pour les laits de corps aussi elle en achète deux façons,l'une a 500 FCFA et le cède a 750 fcfa et l'autre a 1500 FCFA et le revend a 2000 FCFA.
Les bénéfices vont lui permettre d'entretenir sa famille et de s'occuper de sa mère.
texts.en:
This group of 16 members is part of the 'banc villageois' which was created on October 24, 2007. It is composed of women from the same district. They get along well and are active mainly in commerce. KANNY, who is standing at the right in the photo with her left hand raised, is 27 years old and a married mother of two girls. 

With the loan, she is going to purchase soap, perfumes, and body lotions. She purchases an 18-piece packet of soap at 1,000 francs CFA and resells each piece for 250 francs. For the perfumes, she purchases two different ways, one at 1,500 francs to be sold for 2,000 francs, and the other at 350 francs to be sold for 500 francs. For the body lotions too, she purchases one at 500 francs to be sold for 750 francs, and the other at 1,500 francs to be sold for 2,000 francs. The profits will enable her to maintain her family and take care of her mother.

loans.use: to purchase soap, perfumes, and body lotions.

loans.name: Apolonia

texts.en:
Apolonia is an 82-year-old widow and lives in Eastern Looc, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. She lives with her eldest son, who has supported her with all her medical needs. 

She is a pensioner and member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative. She has enjoyed the services it offers to members. Recently, she availed a loan of 20,000 Philippine pesos to pay for a medical check-up and purchase medicines for maintenance. 

She is grateful to the cooperative for supporting her financial needs.

loans.use: to pay for a medical check-up and purchase medicines for maintenance

loans.name: Maa Saktimayi Shg-B Group

texts.en:
Suryarani, 32, lives in the village of Garasa in Mayurbhanj district with her brother Jogeswar and two children. Suryarani is divorced and was separated from her husband four years ago. She is the featured borrower of Saktimayee SHG-B, and is standing on the right side in the photo.

She has been involved in the handloom business for the past two years and, apart from this, she even acts as a helping hand for her brother, who is engaged in farming. Within a short span of time, Suryarani has gained a balance over her family life and work life. She stood against all odds and was successful in her drive towards overcoming poverty.

A few years back, Suryarani and her family went through a financial crunch, as a natural calamity took a toll on their prime source of income. Suryarani couldn’t pay off the debts that she borrowed from the local moneylender, and as a result, certain parts of her mortgage assets were taken off. She felt as if every door of opportunity was closed for her. But, during her struggling phase, her life took a rapid stride with the help of Kiva's partner Peoples Forum, which extended her financial assistance to uplift her financially and socially.

She, along with her group member, is requesting a loan of 24,000 INR, and with the seed investment she will purchase a handloom machine. As her business will start flourishing, gradually she will start repaying the debts.

She will also contribute a significant portion of returns for purchase of agricultural inputs, as it would provide a big leap for her brother. Suryarani is confident that, with festivities around the door, she will be able to earn better returns.

loans.use: to purchase a handloom machine.

loans.name: Jeniffer

texts.en:
Jeniffer is 38 years old and married with four children, two in school. Jeniffer works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a buy and sell nipa roofing business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock of nipa roofing to sell. Jeniffer has been in this business for sixteen years. 

In the future Jeniffer would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock of nipa roofing to sell

loans.name: Suliman

texts.en:
Suliman graduated from Montclair State University with a Bachelor of Science degree in Health/Education with a certificate to teach students age K-12. After his athletic career ended, Suliman stepped into the world of personal fitness and founded Limits R 4 Losers Fitness and Performance.

Through intense study of the sciences of nutrition, biomechanics, and kinesiology, Suliman was able to apply his knowledge and lost over 60 lbs himself. Now, Suliman wants to share his knowledge with others through his personal training service.

Limits R 4 Losers Fitness and Performance offers a wide range of programs and classes suited for each client's individual needs. Some of the packages offered include a high intensity boot camp, seasonal passes, and single session workouts. Suliman trains with an emphasis on the mental drive and commitment to getting results, which makes his services more appealing to those tired of the run-down gym routine.

Suliman is seeking investment in his business to better market his services, attract more clients, and serve existing clients better. The money will help replace old equipment and keep Suliman's services topnotch.

loans.use: to market his services and attract new customers

loans.name: Emy

texts.es:
Emy es de la ciudad de San Pedro, está siguiendo la carrera de Derecho, su aspiración es ser una gran profesional, vive con sus padres y a la vez trabaja para poder cubrir sus estudios.
Emy es una persona muy trabajadora y sacrificada que quiere salir adelante y ser alguien en la vida.
Pide este préstamo para poder cubrir sus gastos de matrícula, y de esa forma poder continuar con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Emy is from the city of San Pedro and is studying law. Her aspiration is to be an extraordinary professional. She lives with her parents and also works to cover the costs of her studies.

Emy is a very hardworking and determined person who wants to get ahead and be someone in life. She asks for this loan to cover the costs of her enrollment and be able to continue with her studies.

loans.use: to pay for her enrollment.

loans.name: Maria Leticia

texts.es: La señora Maria Leticia vive y trabaja en Colomi, de estado civil es soltera, se dedica a la actividad de comercio de verduras y hortalizas, entre ellas los 4 productos de mayor rotación son: cebolla cabeza seca, cebolla verde, zanahoria y tomate; también comercializa otros productos como locoto, achojcha, vaina, pimentón, perejil y otros según la oferta y demanda de los artículos de primera necesidad en la canasta familiar. Los ingresos económicos obtiene a través de la venta de verduras y hortalizas que son también el sustento para su alimentación diaria (auto consumo). La señora Maria Leticia requiere el préstamo para el incrementar sus productos de verduras y hortalizas.                                                                                                                                                           Por último, la señora Maria Leticia se sintió contenta al tener la esperanza de acceder a un préstamo que se adecua a sus necesidades; porque con la compra de más mercadería, tendrá mayores ventas en función a la rotación de su inventario y mejorará su nivel de vida y su situación social.
texts.en:
Maria Leticia lives and works in Colomi. She is single and she works selling vegetables. 
The four major products that she sells are onions, green onions, carrots and tomatoes. She also sells other products such as hot peppers, slipper gourds, peas, bell peppers, parsley and others according to demand of these basic need items. The income that she earns from selling vegetables provides her sustenance for her daily food. Maria Leticia needs a loan to increase her vegetable products.  
Finally, Maria Leticia is happy to have the hope of having access to a loan that it is adequate for her needs: to be able to buy more merchandise, to have better sales based on the rotation of her inventory and to improve her quality of life and social situation.

loans.use: to buy vegetable products to increase and diversify her sales in order to improve her income and the quality of life for her family.

loans.name: Akram

texts.en:
Akram came to the United States six months ago, as a refugee from Iraq. He has a college degree in theology and he is passionate about owning his own business. He decided to start a towing business, after one of his friends taught him about the industry.

With the help of his father in Iraq, he was able to purchase a used tow truck and is currently working for ADZ Transport Inc and SDS Motors. These two companies are currently using Akram’s towing services.

Akram also works as an interpreter, but the income is not enough to provide for him and his wife, so he would like to take on additional towing jobs.

Akram is currently only carrying the minimal insurance required to operate his towing business. To be able to take on more jobs, he needs to purchase full coverage and an additional insurance required by the DMV.

This Kiva loan will make it possible for Akram to purchase the insurance he needs, so he can provide for his family. The additional loan funds will be used to purchase tools and make some repairs to the tow truck.

loans.use: to purchase insurance for his towing company

loans.name: Condrada

texts.en:
Condrada, 49, is married. She is a businesswoman from Tambulig and has expertise in selling and farming. She runs a little sari-sari (variety store) and a  rice field and earns enough income to sufficiently support her family. 

Condrada is a full-fledged member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative and has taken out several loans already. She maintains her membership in good standing, without record of default. 

She is now applying for a loan to purchase rice seeds for good results with healthier, heavier and potentially higher-yielding seedlings. Condrada continues to look for better business opportunities -- proof that she has the passion and the energy to make ends meet for her family.

loans.use: to purchase rice seeds for good results with healthier, heavier and potentially higher-yielding seedlings

loans.name: Melania

texts.en: Melania is 56 years old, married, has three children of adult age, and lives in Tugas, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental. She has been a vegetable grower for more than 10 years. Through this business, she gains an additional income of PHP 5,000.00 every month. Through Paglaum MPC financial assistance, Melania was able to increase her vegetable production. This time, she avails of another loan of PHP 10,000.00 to purchase bags of fertilizer for her farming activities.

loans.use: to purchase bags of fertilizer for her farming activities.

loans.name: Mother Mariie Shg-B Group

texts.en:
The lady standing to the right side in the photo is Samari, aged 42 years. She resides in the village Chuhapali of Bargarh district.

Samari is a hardworking woman who is organized and persistent. She is dedicated to her family and passionate about her job. For the last two years she has been an independent storekeeper. She has a store located in the city centre where she works ten hours a day, every day. She has the advantage of not having much competition because so many locals have become her main customers. She lives with her husband who is a bus driver and a son who works outside the village.

Samari lacks a toilet facility in her home and that is why she, along with her group member, is requesting a loan of 24,000 INR. Samari will use her portion of the loan amount in order to purchase bricks, sand, iron rods, pipes, and a commode to build a toilet.

Samari aspires to add more varieties of stock to her store and serve larger segment of customers and meet their demands

loans.use: to purchase bricks, sand, iron rods, pipes,  and a commode to build a toilet.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seeds, compost, fertilizers, herbicides, pest controls, and other supplies.

loans.name: Bonafe

texts.en: Bonafe is 29 years old and married. She lives in Mahayag-Molave, Zamboanga del Sur. For the past two years, Bonafe has been a farmer. She earns 5,500 PHP each month and is a new member of PMPC. Bonafe is requesting a 25,000 PHP loan to purchase fertilizer. In the future, she hopes to expand and improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer

loans.name: Awa's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe de deux membres fait partie du banc villageois qui a été  crée le 24 octobre 2007. c'est des femmes du même quartier qui ont de bonnes relations et qui s'activent principalement dans le commerce.
AWA debout a droite de la photo est âgée de 63 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 5 enfants dont tous des garçons.
Avec le prêt reçu, elle va acheter des marchandises pour sa boutique qu'elle tient chez elle. Elle achète ses produits en gros et les revend en détail. C'est une activité qu'elle effectue depuis plusieurs années.
Les bénéfices vont lui permettre de s'occuper de sa famille et de participer à des tontines.
texts.en:
This group of two members is part of the 'banc villageois' created on October 24, 2007. These are women from the same district who get along well with one another and who are active mainly in commerce. AWA, who is standing at the right of the photo, is 63 years old and a married mother of five children, all boys. 

With this loan, she is going to purchase goods for her shop, which she has in her home. She purchases her goods wholesale and resells them retail. This is a business that she has operated for several years. The profits will enable her to take care of her family and to participate in tontines.

loans.use: to purchase black pepper, garlic, chili peppers, onions, and potatoes.

loans.name: Dina Luz

texts.es: Dina es una joven perceptiva para los negocios, luego de laborar por muchos años en un restaurant, consideró que independizarse y proyectarse como una microempresaria, sería de mucho bienestar para su futuro y que mejor forma que haciendo lo que más le gusta  “Pizzas”.  Hace dos años deleita a los habitantes de un barrio en Cartagena de indias con sus Pizzas en distintas preparaciones; hawaiana, napolitana, champiñones con pollo, Jamón con queso, vegetariana, caliche y demás, que ofrece los días viernes, sábado, domingo y lunes, a partir de las 4 p.m. hasta las 9 p.m.  En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para comprar harina, queso, piña, carnes frías y especias.  Con esta inversión podrá responder a la creciente demanda.  Su meta a futuro es estudiar cocina y  tener un local bien organizado.
texts.en:
Dina is a young woman who is perceptive when it comes to business; after working for many years in a restaurant, she decided to become independent and promote herself as a microentrepreneur, since it would be a source of wellbeing for her future, and what better form of doing that than with what she likes to do the best: "Pizzas." For the last two years, she has delighted the residents of a neighborhood in Cartagena with her Pizzas of different styles: Hawaiian, Napolitano, mushrooms with chicken, ham with cheese, vegetarian, caliche and more, which she offers on Fridays, Saturdays, Sundays, and Mondays from 4pm to 9pm.

Now she is applying for a Kiva loan, the first request for financing she has made to the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation, to buy flour, cheese, pineapple, cold meats, and spices. With this investment, she will be able to respond to growing demand. Her goal in the future is to study cooking and have a well-organized restaurant.

loans.use: To buy flour, cheese, pineapple, cold meats, and spices

loans.name: Rocky's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe de 5 membres fait partie du banc villageois qui a été crée le 22 décembre 2012. Il regroupe des femmes du même village qui ont de bonnes relations et qui s'activent principalement dans le commerce, l'embouche et l'agriculture.
FATY debout a droite de la photo et levant la main gauche est âgée de 46 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 6 enfants dont 2 filles et 4 garçons.
Avec le prêt reçu, elle va acheter des moutons et aussi de l'arachide.Elle achète 5 moutons a 30 000 voire 35 000 FCFA. Elle revend le mouton après élevage a 75 000 FCFA. Elle achète de l’aliment de bétail pour 35 000 FCFA. Avec le reste du prêt, elle va acheter de l'arachide pour 150 FCFA le kilo et le cède a 200 FCF.
Les bénéfices vont lui permettre d'entretenir sa famille en participant aux dépenses quotidiennes,épargner  et a rembourser son prêt.
texts.en:
This group of five members is part of the 'banc villageois' created on December 22, 2012. It is composed of women from the same village who get along well with one another and who are active mainly in commerce. FATY, who is standing at the right of the photo with her left hand raised, is 46 years old and a married mother of six children, of whom two are girls and four are boys. 

With this loan, she is going to purchase sheep and also some peanuts. She is purchasing 5 sheep at 30,000 francs CFA, or even 35,000 francs. After raising them, she resells each at 75,000 francs. She is purchasing some feed at 35,000 francs. With the rest of the loan, she is going to purchase some peanuts at 150 francs per kilo to be sold at 200 francs. 

The profits will enable her to maintain her family by helping to cover day-to-day expenses and also to save money and pay back the loan.

loans.use: to purchase sheep and peanuts

loans.name: Los Puntualitos Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal LOS PUNTUALITOS, el banco está ubicado en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Rosmery sigue  con el negocio de restaurante, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia continua elaborando diversos platos como saltados, sopas, arroz con pollo entre otros para sus clientes que le solicitan cada dia,la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
 La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de arroz, carnes,menestras entre otros.
Los demás socios se dedican a la venta de tienda de abarrotes, transporte, librería, ropa.
El socio que sale en la foto adjunta pidio permiso para llegar tarde a la reunion por motivos de trabajo.
texts.en:
Rosmery is a member of the Communal Bank “Los Puntualitos”, which is located in Cusco Province in the Department of Cusco. She continues to manage her restaurant. Rosmery has been in business for quite some time and is doing well thanks to the effort she puts into her work each day. She continues to prepare different dishes such as stir-fries, soups, chicken and rice, and other specialties that her customers request each day. Rosmery wants to keep working so that she can continue to support her family.

She is grateful for the loan that has been issued and promises to complete her payments according to the established terms. Rosmery is requesting a loan in order to buy rice, meats, stewed vegetables, and other supplies.

The other members engage in businesses such as managing a grocery store, providing transportation, operating a bookstore, and selling clothes. The member who appears in the attached photo received permission to arrive late to the meeting for work reasons.

loans.use: to buy rice, meats, stewed vegetables, and other supplies.

loans.name: Shirley

texts.en:
Shirley is 42 years old, a widow, has two children of school age and lives in Tambulig-Molave, Zamboanga del Sur. She owns and operates a flower shop, pottery and a rice farm. She has been doing these business activities since her husband died a few years ago. She knew she had to stand on her feet, and her children are in college now. 

Through the financial assistance of Paglaum MPC, Shirley is able to finance her businesses. Recently, she is taking a loan of PHP 50,000 to purchase additional inventory for flower shop and pottery.

loans.use: to purchase additional inventory for her flower shop and pottery

loans.name: Loida

texts.en:
Loida is 52 years old. She is known in the Ozamiz area for her sari-sari (variety) store. She is actively participating in the various programs and services that the co-op offers. She hopes to live comfortably, with a decent house, for which she applied for a loan to purchase plywood, nails, and sticks. 

She hopes to maintain her membership in good standing, with a good repayment record. It matters that she has been given a priority, as a microfinance member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC). This is what she is thankful for, when all her financing needs of her retailing business are supported by PMPC.

loans.use: to purchase plywood, nails, and sticks for her house.

loans.name: Egleceria

texts.en:
Egleceria is a strong-willed woman who pushes her ability when it comes to her piggery and rice production business. She is a mother and hands-on businesswoman who never tires of supporting her family. 

Recently, she availed a loan to purchase fertilizer. Aside from her project of covering her pig pens with concrete, she decided to add a parcel of land to increase her rice production.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline works hard to support her family. Evangeline is married and has a making of nipa (palm frond) roofing business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional bundles of nipa leaves, bamboo, etc., to make nipa roofing.

Evangeline has been in this business for 20 years now.

In the future, Evangeline would like to save enough to build a house for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional bundles of nipa leaves, bamboo, etc., to make nipa roofing.

loans.name: Lilia Esthela

texts.es:
Lilia es una joven de 24 años, vive en casa de sus padres en la ciudad de Santo Domingo, una ciudad muy agradable por su gente y además muy comercial porque es el puente terrestre que une a la sierra de la costa.
Lilia es una chica muy trabajadora, en la actualidad se dedica al servicio contable, realiza declaraciones tributarias a personas naturales; comenta que fue duro al principio porque hasta darse a conocer le costó mucho, tuvo que recorrer por diferentes lugares y comenzar de a poco. Es una chica muy responsable realiza el trabajo desde casa, gracias a este negocio ella pudo adquirir una comutadora donde realiza sus trabajos, comenta también que amó tanto esta profesión que decidió estudiar en la universidad y ahora ya está en la defensa de su tesis para ser toda una profesional.
Lilia está agradecida con KIVA porque ninguna otra institución quiso apoyarla, con este crédito ella podrá comprar una mejor computadora y una impresora para mejorar su atención a sus clientes, seguir creciendo ya que en un futuro no muy lejano tiene planificado abrir su propio local.
texts.en:
Lilia is 24 year old, lives with her parents in the city of Santo Domingo, a very pleasant city because of its people and also very commercial because it is the land bridge linking the mountains to the coast.

Lilia is a hardworking girl.  She makes a living in accounting services.  She makes tax declarations for natural persons.  She says it was hard to become know, and she had to go to different places and start small. 

She is a very responsible girl who does her work from home.  Thanks to this business she was able to acquire a computer where she carries out her work.  She also says that she loved this profession so much that she decided to study at university and now is ready to defend her thesis, and then she will be a real professional.  

Lilia is grateful to KIVA because no other institution wanted to support her.  With this loan she will be able to purchase a better computer and printer to improve her services to her customers, continue to grow and, in the not too distant future, be able to open her own locale.

loans.use: To purchase a new computer and printer thus improving services to her customers.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.en: Carmen has wide experience in farming. She has mastered farming activities in growing, caring and harvesting as well as earning income. Carmen has supported her husband doing this type of work.  Like a farmer, Carmen has nurtured her membership with PMPC and has maintained a good repayment record. She knows she can always turn to the Cooperative for her financial needs. Recently, she applied for a loan to purchase rice seeds so she will have good results in healthier, heavier, and potentially higher-yielding seedlings.  Someday, Carmen hopes to purchase another piece of rice land to cultivate that will potentially add income for the family.

loans.use: to purchase rice seeds so she will have good results with healthier, heavier, and potentially higher-yielding seedlings.

loans.name: Rey

texts.en:
Rey is 40 years old and lives in Tambulig-Molave, Zamboanga del Sur. He is married and has three children. 

Rey owns and operates a business providing transport to local community members for a living. He also owns and runs his rice field for additional family income. He has been doing this for five years. 

He has requested a loan of PHP 50,000 to purchase rice seeds that will have good results in healthier, heavier, and potentially higher-yielding seedlings.

loans.use: to purchase rice seeds that will have good results in healthier, heavier, and potentially higher-yielding seedlings

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sewing machines and a large quantity of supplies to be able to produce nightgowns; in the hopes of providing a better quality of life for her family.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia has been a farmer for almost 30 years. She is 64 years old, a widow, and has eight children of adult age. She lives in Mahayag-Molave, Zamboanga del Sur. 

This farming activity gives her enough income that suffices for her family needs. Recently, she is taking a loan of PHP 15,000 to buy bags of fertilizers and bottles of chemicals.

loans.use: to buy bags of fertilizers and bottles of chemicals

loans.name: Ludivina

texts.en:
Ludivina manages her eatery business in Tambulig-Molave, Zamboanga del Sur. She mastered the business in the early years of her marriage. The business has done well in supporting the needs of the family. 

Ludivina has local customers and would accept catering for added income. Aside from her eatery business, Ludivina owns and operates a rice farm, which adds to her income. 

Recently, she borrowed an amount to buy bags of fertilizer to grow more produce.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer to grow more produce

loans.name: Novelyn

texts.en: Novelyn is a businesswoman from Tudela, Misamis Occidental. She is 25 years old, married and has expertise in selling. She runs a little sari-sari store and earns a meager income that sufficiently supports her family. Novelyn is a full-fledged member of PMPC and has taken several loans already. She maintains her membership in good standing without records of default. Now, she applied for a loan to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items. Novelyn continues to look for better business opportunities, proof that she has the passion and the energy to make ends meet for her family.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items.

loans.name: Elinkine Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est constitué de vingt membres. Ce sont des femme qui s'activent principalement dans le petit commerce et elles ont toujours remboursé leurs prêts sans difficultés. Madame Célestine qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main est la représentante du groupe. Elle est veuve, âgée de 47 ans et mère de quatre enfants dont trois fille. Elle s'active dans la vente de légumes et de mangues depuis plus de six ans. Elle va acheter avec le montant sollicité des mangues et des légumes. Les bénéfices vont servir à épargner et à prendre à charge les charges de sa famille.
texts.en: This group is composed of twenty members. They are women who are active mainly in small-scale commerce. They have always paid back their loans without difficulty.
