The good thing about her business is that she can count on steady clients. The disadvantage is the lack of capital to diversify her merchandise. 

Her dream is to open a permanent kiosk from which to sell. She wants to purchase second-hand clothing in bulk in order to diversify her offering and reach new clients. This is her third sequence of loans with the institution during her 11 years of business. 

For those reasons, Virginia requests a loan to purchase second-hand clothing in bulk in order to diversify her offering and reach new clients.

loans.use: to buy bulk second-hand clothing in order to diversify her offering and reach new clients.

loans.name: Fuerza 2008 Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “FUERZA 2008” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco. 
La socia Rosa continua  dedicándose al negocio de restaurante, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia continua preparando diferentes tipos de comida como arroz con pollo, saltados entre otros para todos sus clientes que le solicitan, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de arroz, menestras entre otros.
Las socias que salen adjuntas a  la foto pidieron  permiso para llegar tarde a la reunión por motivos de trabajo.
Los socios en general agradecen el crédito otorgado y se comprometen a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
These members belong to the Communal Bank “Fuerza 2008”, which is part of Asociación Arariwa in the city of Cusco. 

Rosa, who is a member, continues to manage a restaurant business. She has had the business for a good while and it is going well for her thanks to the effort she puts into her business every day. She is a responsible and diligent person. She continues to prepare different types of dishes such as chicken and rice, stir-fries, and other foods that all of her customers request. This is how she brings up her family.

Rosa is asking for the loan to buy rice, lentils and other items.

The members who appear in the attached photos requested permission to arrive late to the meeting for work reasons.

The group as a whole are grateful for the loan provided and promise to meet their agreed repayments.

loans.use: to buy rice, lentils and other items.

loans.name: Muhabbat

texts.ru: Мухаббат живет в районе Кубадиён. Ей 41 год. Мухаббат разведена с мужем. Она одна занимается воспитанием своих детей. Год за годом с ростом ее детей, ей становится тяжело обеспечивать их. Увидев трудное состояние сестры, её брат решил помочь сестре. Он построил ей магазин, чтобы она продала там продукты питания и самостоятельно занималась бизнесом. Магазин уже готов, однако у Мухаббат нет средств на закупку товара. Она обратилась за кредитом и хочет купить необходимые продукты для продажи. Мухаббат надеется, что с вашей помощью она сможет, открыт свой новый бизнес и улучшит жененные условии своих детей.
texts.en: Muhabbat lives in the Qubadiyon region. She is 41 years old. Muhabbat is divorced.She is raising her children alone. Year after year as her children grow it becomes more difficult for her to provide for them. Having seen the difficult situation of his sister, her brother decided to help his sister. He built her a store so that she could sell produce there and run a business independently. The store is already ready, however Muhabbat does not have the funds to buy goods. She has applied for a loan and wants to buy essential produce for sale. Muhabbat hopes that with your help she will be able to open her new business and improve her children's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy essential produce for sale.

loans.name: Ugul

texts.ru: Угул живет и проживает на районе Шахритус. Ей 51 год. Она замужем. Ее муж находится на заработках заграницей, как многие мужчины республики. Воспитанием троих детей возложена на хрупкие плечи Угула. К тому она уже привыкла к такому режиму. Угул в поддержку мужа тоже на Родине имеет не большой бизнес. Она занимается купле продажей скотов. Угул уже 5 лет продвигает эту деятельность и считает, что пора расширять деятельность. Угул просит ей помочь купить несколько голов телят и бычков. Она увеличить поголовья скотин и расширить деятельность. Таким образом когда у нее будет процветающий бизнес и будет приносить хороший доход, ее муж вернется и они будут заниматься этим бизнесом вдвоем.
texts.en: Ugul lives in the Shahrituz area. She is 51 years old. She is married. Her husband is away working abroad, like many men from the Republic. The raising of their three children is entrusted to Ugul's frail shoulders. She has got used to this regime. Ugul also has a small business in her homeland in support of her husband. She buys and sells livestock. Ugul has been doing this activity for five years and considers it time to expand the business. Ugul is asking for help to buy a few heads of calves and steers. She will increase the size of her herd and expand her business. In this way she will have a flourishing business and will earn a good income, her husband will return and they will run this business together.

loans.use: to buy a couple of heads of livestock.

loans.name: Mayra Lorena

texts.es:
La señora Mayra de 34  años de edad, vive con su esposo y sus dos hijas  en su casa propia, se dedica desde hace 11  años al negocio de venta de tortillas, cuajada y también vende Avon,  sus clientes son todos sus vecinos y demás personas de las comunidades vecinas.
Doña Mayra también se dedica a la crianza de ganado,  sus clientes le prefieren por  su buena atención y sus  buenos  productos,  vive en una comunidad al sur de Honduras, es una mujer emprendedora con deseos de salir adelante y lucha día con día para mejorar su calidad de vida. 
Doña Mayra está solicitando el préstamo para compra de maíz y concentrado para las vacas,  además quiere comprar maíz  para luego revender con el apoyo de este préstamo pretende mejorar sus ingresos y también su calidad de vida, es un cliente subsiguiente.
Su sueño es aumentar  su clientela para mejorar sus ingresos y al mismo  tiempo mejorar su futuro junto a su familia.

San Lorenzo, Honduras -  Junio del  2015.
texts.en:
Mayra, aged 34, lives in her own home in a community in the south of Honduras, with her husband and their two daughters. She is an enterprising woman, who strives to do well for herself and works hard every day to improve her quality of life. 

For the last 11 years, she has been earning a living by selling tortillas, curd, and Avon products. Her customers are all of her neighbours and other people from the nearby communities.

Mayra also raises cattle. Her customers prefer to do business with her because of her customer service and the quality of her products. 

Mayra is requesting a loan to buy corn and feed concentrate for the cows. She also wants to buy corn for resale. 

With this loan, she hopes to improve her income as well as her quality of life. She is a returning client.

Her dream is to increase her customer base while improving her and her family's future. 

San Lorenzo, Honduras – June 2015

loans.use: to buy corn and feed concentrate for her businesses (for raising cattle and to resell corn).

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is 61 years old, married and supports a family of eight children. He has been practicing farming for the last four years, earning 10,000 KES per month.

Joseph has applied for his first loan of 25,000 KES from VisionFund Kenya to buy a dairy cow for milk production and supply in the area for more income gain. 

He plans to use the anticipated profits to improve his farming. His future hopes and dreams are to be financially stable.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow for milk production and supply in the area for more income gain

loans.name: Jose Florentino

texts.es:
José, se dedica a sembrar granos básicos, vive con su esposa y su hijo, ellos dependen económicamente de él, inicio su propio negocio hace 10 años, desde entonces practica dicha actividad, lo hace de manera personal, solo en ocasiones contrata mozos para que le ayuden a agilizar los trabajos, su padre le enseño el oficio.
Con el capital que está solicitando prestado comprara insumos agrícolas y pagara el alquiler de una manzana de tierra para sembrar con granos básicos, invertirá en los materiales que necesita para la próxima siembra esperando tener cosechas abundantes.
La esperanza de José es aumentar sus cosechas para atender a nuevos clientes y así generar mayores ingresos para cubrir sus compromisos.
texts.en:
José makes a living growing staple grains. He lives with his wife and their son. They depend on him financially. He started his own business 10 years ago and has been doing this activity ever since. He does the work himself and only occasionally hires farmhands to help him do the work more quickly. His father taught him his skills. 

With the capital he is requesting he will buy agricultural supplies and pay the rent for a hectare of land to sow with staple grains. He will invest in the materials he needs for the next sowing, hoping to have abundant harvests. José's hope is to increase his harvests so he can deal with new customers and so make more income to cover his commitments.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and pay the rent for a hectare of land to sow with staple grains.

loans.name: Adilia Del Carmen

texts.es:
Adilia, elabora tortillas para vender en su localidad, negocio que inicio desde el año 2010, lo hace con un horario de nueve de la mañana a seis de la tarde, de esta manera obtiene los recursos necesarios para cumplir con sus obligaciones, Vive en casa propia en compañía de su linda familia integrada por su esposo y dos hijos, uno de ellos estudia y el otro le ayuda en el negocio.
El crédito le ayudara a comprar maíz, leña, cal y gas propano para elaborar la venta de tortillas, pretende aprovechar los buenos precios de la materia prima para que el margen de ganancias sea mucho mayor.
Las aspiraciones que ella tiene son resarcir su deuda y continuar trabajando para darle a su familia el sustento diario.
texts.en:
Adilia makes tortillas to sell in her town, a business she has run since 2010. She works from nine in the morning to six at night, and in this way, obtains the necessary resources to meet her obligations. 

She lives in her own house in the company of her lovely family, made up of her spouse and two children. One of her children is in school and the other helps with the business. 

The loan will help her to buy corn, firewood, lime and propane gas so she can make and sell tortillas. She hopes to take advantage of the good prices of the raw materials so that her margin of earnings is much greater.

She aspires to reimburse her debt and continue working to give her family their daily sustenance.

loans.use: to buy corn, firewood, lime and propane gas to make and sell tortillas.

loans.name: Jospehine

texts.en:
Jospehine is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Jospehine is 53 years old and has one child who is still in school.

Jospehine has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She requested a 10,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to buy more fish to sell.

Jospehine has been in this business for 5 years. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell

loans.name: Maa Tarini Shg-C Group

texts.en:
Sanjukata, 36, is the one standing to the left in a red saree. She resides in a small village in Dhenkanal district. She is a mother of two daughters and one son, and her husband has been running his own business of meat for the past 10 years. Her husband is responsible for fulfilling the needs of his entire family and managing the household. However, they are deprived of having a toilet in their house due to financial constraints. The money that her husband earns is just used to fulfill their basic necessities of life.

Sanjukta along with her group member has requested a loan of 30,000 INR. Sanjukta will use her portion of the loan to build a toilet and purchase necessary sanitary fittings for the same.

Sanjukta has a wish to start her own cosmetic sales business and help her husband financially in meeting all the expenses of the family smoothly.

loans.use: to build a toilet and purchase necessary sanitary fittings for the same

loans.name: Aziz

texts.ru: Азиз молодой человек из района Дж.Руми. Ему 30 лет. Он веселый и активный. Азиз потерял работу и давно не мог найти хорошую работу. Азиз не смог бы оставить свою жену и двоих маленький сыновей и ухать на заработки заграницу как многие мужчины республики. Азиз решил способ решить свою проблему. Он может хорошо водить машину и почему бы не воспользоваться этим? Азиз решил купить машину и предоставлять услуги такси. Он уже нашел подходящую машину, и осталось его купить. Средства Азиз не позволяют ему самостоятельно совершить покупку.
texts.en: Aziz is a young man from the J. Rumy region. He is 30 years old. He is cheerful and active. Aziz lost his job and has not been able to find a good job for a long time. Aziz would not be able to leave his wife and two young sons to go away to earn money abroad like many other men from the Republic. Aziz has decided on a way to solve his problem. He can drive a car well and so why not take advantage of this? Aziz has decided to buy a car and to provide a taxi service. He has already found a suitable car, and he just needs to buy it. Aziz's funds do not allow him to complete the purchase on his own.

loans.use: to buy a car and start a new taxi business.

loans.name: Lilibeth

texts.en:
Lilibeth is a married woman who is 35 years old. She has four children, all of whom are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Lilibeth has a fish-vending business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy an additional box of fish to sell in her fish stall.

She has successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Lilibeth has been in this business for six years. In the future, Lilibeth would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy an additional box of fish to sell in her fish stall.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is married and works hard to support her family. She has a fish-vending business in the Philippines.

Maria has requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more fish to sell to her customers.

Maria has been in this business for six years now.

In the future, Maria would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Jovelyn

texts.en:
Jovelyn is 30 years old and has two children. She is married and has one child who is currently in school.

Jovelyn is in an agricultural business fattening pigs in the Philippines. She requested an 11,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase feeds, vitamins and other supplies for her pigs.

Jovelyn has been in this business for 4 years now, and has borrowed 3 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase feeds, vitamins and other supplies for her pigs

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco, es un agricultor que tiene que trabajar muy duro para salir adelante con sus compromisos, específicamente cultiva maíz desde hace 20 años, con la cosecha puede alimentar a su familia y comercializa el resto para tener ingresos, vive junto a su esposa, ellos tienen tres hijos que son independientes y les apoyan económicamente.
Requiere de un crédito para poder realizar sus trabajos agrícolas de temporada, comprara insumos agrícolas y pagara los costos de preparación del terreno en que cultivara maíz, espera contar con todo lo necesario para que su cosecha sea abundante y no le afecten las plagas.
 La visión que él tiene es cancelar la deuda y almacenar suficiente granos para consumo familiar.
texts.en:
Francisco is a farmer who has to work very hard to meet his obligations. Specifically, he has cultivated corn for 20 years. With the harvest, he can feed his family and sell the rest to have income.

He lives with his wife. They have three children who are independent and support them economically. 

He requests a loan so he can carry out his farming work this season. He will buy farming supplies and will pay the costs of preparing the land in which he cultivates corn. He hopes to have everything necessary for his harvest to be abundant and to not be affected by infestations. 

The vision he has is to pay off the loan and store enough grain for home consumption.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and pay the costs of preparing the land in which he cultivates corn.

loans.name: Takhmina

texts.ru: Тахмина успешно погасила свой кредит, использовав его по назначению. Она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. На сегодняшний день деятельность Тахмины приносит ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 13,000 сом (KGS). В хозяйстве есть коровы, 3 лошади. На 1,80 Га земли она выращивает перец и клевер для реализации. Продает молоко на ежедневной основе. Для дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, она обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку удобрений для полеводства и скота для увеличения поголовья. Доходы от кредита Тахмина планирует использовать для развития своего хозяйства и намерена в будущем сделать дома ремонт.
texts.en: Takhmina successfully repaid her loan, having used it for its intended purpose. She is grateful to the Kiva Fund and to everyone who helped to finance her. Today Takhmina's business brings in a monthly profit of 13,000 som (KGS). She has cows and three horses, and she grows peppers and clover for sale on 1.8 hectares of land. She sells milk on a daily basis. For the further development of her business she has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy fertilizer to grow crops and livestock to increase her herd. Takhmina plans to use the proceeds of the loan to develop her farm and intends to renovate her house in future.

loans.use: to buy some cattle and to cultivate her land in order to invest in her business.

loans.name: Daysi Marina

texts.es:
Daysi, se dedica a trabajar en el campo cultivando maíz y frijol, inicia  a trabajar desde la seis de la mañana hasta las dos de la tarde, tiene una experiencia de más de 15 años y es un oficio que heredo de familia. Ella es acompañada, vive con su pareja y cuatro hijos, la familia depende totalmente de los ingresos que generan al vender parte de las cosechas y no reciben otro tipo de ayuda económica.
Con préstamo se podrá comprar insumos agrícolas como abono, semilla e insecticidas, le dará un mejor trato a los cultivos de granos básicos, al realizar la inversión espera tener cosechas más abundantes para ampliar su mercado y tener una mejor situación económica.
Los sueños de Daysi son remodelar su vivienda, costear los estudios universitarios de sus hijos y tener un nuevo rubro para generar más ingresos.
texts.en:
Daysi works farming corn and beans, she starts work at 6 am and finishes at 2 pm, she has over 15 years of experience and it’s a job she learned from her family.
She has a partner and lives with him and their four children.  Her family depends entirely on the income generated from harvest sales and they don’t get any other type of financial hep.
With the loan she will be able to buy agricultural inputs such as fertilizer, seed, insecticide and will be able to maintain her crops of basic grains. By making this investment, she hopes to have a bigger harvest and expand the market and improve her financial situation. Daysi’s dream is to make renovations to her residence, pay for university for her children and have a new source of income to generate more income.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs such as fertilizer, seed, insecticide and will be able to maintain her crops of basic grains.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.en:
Lucia is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a food production/vending business in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 21,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients like spices, vegetables, meat, fish, etc. for her business.

Lucia has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of loans from NWTF. She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting this new loan to further build her business.

Lucia has been in this business for 32 years and earns more income from selling purchase order cards. She aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like spices, vegetables, meat, fish, etc. for her food production/vending business

loans.name: Argemiro

texts.es: Argemiro de 67 años, con una gran experiencia en las labores del campo, decidió iniciar su negocio de cría y comercialización de conejos.  Las madrigueras de estos animales están ubicadas en la azotea de su vivienda; él elaboró cajones en madera y usa para protegerlos de la intemperie plásticos sujetados al techo de cada caja.  Con la finalidad de adecuar un mejor habitad para la reproducción y un espacio más higiénico, Argemiro está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para hacer un cerramiento en la azotea y colocarle techo.  Esta inversión es muy importante para mantener en salud a los conejos y así poder comercializar entre laboratorios y tiendas de mascotas las crías.  A futuro su meta es mantener sus clientes y ofrecer un excelente servicio.
texts.en:
Argemiro, age 67, has a lot of experience in farming and decided to start his business of raising and selling rabbits. The lairs of these animals are located at the rooftop of his house. He crafted wooden boxes, and to protect them from the outdoors he puts plastic over each box. 

With the purpose of improving a place for reproduction and create a more hygienic space, Argemiro is requesting a Kiva loan, which is the first loan that he makes with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. He will use it to close the rooftop and put a roof on it. 

This investment is of great importance to keep his rabbits healthy and sell them to labs and pet shops. For the future his goal is to maintain his customers and give them an excellent service.

loans.use: to close his rooftop and put a roof on it.

loans.name: Gulzipa

texts.ru: Гулзипа, 59 лет, вдова. Мать 2 детей. Гулзипа на пенсии, также занимается животноводством и полеводством. Она начала заниматься животноводством 20 лет назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Гулзипы, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 3 коровы. На 0,69 Га земли выращивает клевер и картофель. Ежемесячный доход составляет 9,000 сом (KGS), этих средств не хватает на достойную жизнь и содержание семьи и хозяйства. Поэтому в целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Гулзипа обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коровы для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Гулзипа планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины и постройку сарая для скота.
texts.en: Gulzipa is 59 years old and a widow. She is the mother of two children. Gulzipa is retired and also rears animals and grows crops. She began rearing animals 20 years ago by buying livestock to the value of 10,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Gulzipa's hard work, today she has three cows. She grows clover and potatoes on 0.69 hectares of land. Her monthly income is 9,000 som (KGS) but these funds are not enough for a decent life and to support a family and farm. With the aim of further developing her business, Gulzipa has therefore applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 30,000 som (KGS) to buy a cow to increase the size of her herd. Gulzipa plans to invest the proceeds of the loan in further increasing her herd of domestic livestock and building a barn for the livestock.

loans.use: to buy a cow in order to help bolster her family's income.

loans.name: Ma. Elena

texts.en:
Ma. Elena is married and works hard to support her family. She has a tailoring business in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional materials like fabric, zippers, etc. for her business.

Ma. Elena has been in this business for 12 years now. She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting this new loan to further build her business.

In the future, Ma. Elena would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials like fabric, zippers, etc. for her business

loans.name: Ma. Emperatriz

texts.en:
Ma. Emperatriz is 65 years old and married with five children. She is in the agricultural business of pig fattening in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies for her business.

Ma. Emperatriz has been in pig fattening for five years now and has borrowed nine times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business. She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting this new loan to further build her business.

Ma. Emperatriz would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies for her business

loans.name: Kunduz

texts.ru: Кундуз, 54 года, мать 2 детей. У нее среднее образование, сейчас на пенсии. Также в качестве дополнительного источника доходов для семьи, она занимается животноводством, начав бизнес 36 лет назад с 20,000 сом (KGS). Супруг и дети активно помогают по хозяйству. На сегодня в хозяйстве есть корова, 8 овец. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Кундуз обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 120,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Кундуз планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение ее бизнеса.
texts.en: Kunduz is 54 years old and the mother of two children. She has a secondary education. She is retired now. She also rears animals as a source of additional income for her family, having started the business 36 years ago with 20,000 som (KGS). Her husband and children actively help her on the farm. Today she has a cow and eight sheep. In order to develop her business further, Kunduz has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 120,000 som (KGS) to buy some sheep to increase the size of her flock. Kunduz plans to invest the proceeds of the loan in the further growth of her business.

loans.use: to buysome sheep in order to increase her flock.

loans.name: Guldasta

texts.ru: Гульдаста, 49 лет, вдова, мать 2 детей. У Гульдасты - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 6 лет назад. Благодаря упорному труду Гульдасты, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2,75 ГА земельного надела, на котором выращивает рис, полученную продукцию реализует на рынке города. В целях дальнейшего развития своего дела, Гульдаста обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку удобрений и обработку почвы для выращивания экологически чистого риса. Развитие бизнеса позволит увеличить доходы семьи и накопить на обучение дочери в университете.
texts.en: Guldasta is 49 years old, a widow, and the mother of two children. Guldasta has a secondary education. She rears animals and grows crops as the main source of income for her family, having started six years ago. Thanks to Guldasta's hard work, today she has 2.75 hectares of land on which she grows rice. She sells the resulting product at the town market. In order to develop her business further, Guldasta has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) to buy fertilizer and to cultivate her land for growing organic rice. The development of the business will enable her to increase her family's income and save up for her daughter's university education.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pay for cultivation of her land in order to grow organic rice.
